items.sentence: I\'m sure Tom understands why we weren\'t there.
I think that Tom would be willing to go with us.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t like the food.
Tom made it clear that he didn\'t want me there.
Tom made it clear what he didn\'t want us to do.
I can\'t believe Tom didn\'t tell us about Mary.
We have many reasons to be proud of our country.
Tom picked up the glass of water and took a sip.
Tom plays tennis with Mary at least once a week.
Tom was willing to sacrifice everything for you.
